Brittains glory: or, The history of the life and death of K. Arthur, and the adventures of the knights of the Round Table : giving a relation of their heroick exploits and victories in many lands ... pleasant and delightful, altogether worthy the perusal of the ingenious reader. Malory, Thomas, Sir, 15th cent. J. S.
[24] p. illus. 20 cm.
Printed by H. B. for J. Wright, J. Clark, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger, [London] 1684.
Preface signed: J.S. Attributed by Wing to Sir Thomas Malory. Reproduction of original in Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University.
=======
